articles.title: Sorry In Advance, But Now That You Know These 26 Products Exist, You'll Think About Them Every Day Until You Own Them
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Pound Cake, a BIPOC-owned small business, launched CAKE THEORY, a neutralizing lip gloss. Friendsheep introduced reusable soot sprite dryer balls handmade by women in Kathmandu, Nepal. Pain Care Labs launched Buzzy, a vibrating ice pack designed to desensitize injection sites. Tarnavskaya Studio, a small business in Ukraine, offers hand-carved silk moth hairclips. Boona introduced a no-tools-required dual-showerhead.

articles.title: The New Sticky Notes App on Windows 11 Is Just What You Need
articles.author: Yadullah Abidi
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched a new updated version of the Sticky Notes app for Windows, featuring a redesigned user interface, deeper integration with OneNote, improved features, and formatting options. The updated Sticky Notes app includes functionalities like pinning notes to the desktop, better screenshot handling, automatic source tagging, and an improved design compared to the older version. These enhancements aim to provide users with a more efficient and visually appealing note-taking experience on Windows.

articles.title: Chinese AI start-up MiniMax intensifies competition with new open-source models
articles.author: Ben Jiang
articles.summary: MiniMax, a Chinese AI start-up, launched the MiniMax-01 LLM family, including MiniMax-Text-01 and MiniMax-VL-01, designed to rival US AI systems. SenseTime also unveiled a new 'unified large model' combining text and image understanding with reasoning capabilities, ranked highly among multimodal models by SuperCLUE.

articles.title: Nvidia just announced an app that every PC gamer should install
articles.author: Jacob Roach
articles.summary: Nvidia is launching Project G-Assist as a beta feature within the Nvidia app in February for all RTX graphics cards. This AI assistant acts as a chatbot that optimizes GPU performance and game settings based on user requests, similar to ChatGPT. It allows users to optimize performance for specific frame rate targets.

articles.title: A Playbook for First-Time CTV Advertisers
articles.author: Matt Collins
articles.summary: MNTN, a fast-growing TV advertising platform, helps new-to-TV brands succeed. MNTN's head of product marketing, Matt Collins, guides companies through the evolving TV landscape, offering insights and strategies to launch their own advertising dynasty, while also providing guidance for companies of different sizes and budgets.

articles.title: It's got the juice: How iJooz squeezed its way into Singaporeans' hearts
articles.author: Ang Hwee Min
articles.summary: iJooz launched a mobile app in November 2024, accounting for 10% of sales, and its fifth-generation machines now offer an ice option available on about 20 machines out of 1,500 islandwide. iJooz is also planning expansion into the US market in 2025 after success in Japan.

articles.title: ANZ launches Falcon Lens AI experience via Special, T&DA, PHD and oOh!Media
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: ANZ has launched 'Falcon Lens', an AI-powered experience, to educate Australians about personalized fraud protection during the Australian Open. Developed with Special and T&DA, it allows users to generate an image of a personalized falcon by taking a selfie. Users can also enter their personal falcon into a draw to win AO Finals tickets.

articles.title: The Best Dry Shampoo
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares various dry shampoo products. It highlights Not Your Mother's Clean Freak Dry Shampoo for its affordable price and effective formula, I Dew Care Tap Secret Mattifying Dry Shampoo Powder for its portability and color range, and Crown Affair The Dry Shampoo for its luxurious experience and pleasant scent. The review considers factors like efficacy, scent, ingredients, application, and value.

articles.title: 2024 Hyundai Santa Fe Hybrid Test: Better Mileage with Some Trade-Offs
articles.author: Joe Lorio
articles.summary: Hyundai launched the Santa Fe Hybrid, featuring a turbocharged 1.6-liter four-cylinder engine paired with an electric motor. It delivers 231 horsepower and achieves an EPA-estimated 35 mpg city and 34 mpg highway for the AWD version. The hybrid model has a starting price of $39,175 for the 2025 model.

articles.title: 10 best stain removers for clothes, tried and tested
articles.summary: The best laundry stain removers for 2025 include Stardrops the pink stuff oxi powder stain remover, Ocado stain remover for whites, Vanish oxi action whitener and stain remover for whites, Ace ultra for colours, and The Lab Co spot stain remover. Other stain removers tested are Sainsbury's stain remover powder, Ecover liquid stain remover, Dr Beckmann power brush stain remover, Tesco oxy stain remover spray, and Elbow Grease stubborn stain remover.

articles.title: My Content Co Launches AI Chatbot Service for Website Integration
articles.author: My Content Co
articles.summary: Remote Content Marketing Business, a Maryland-based company, launched a new AI chatbot service named "Cory". Cory is a customizable chatbot that utilizes website data to answer visitor questions, aiming to improve customer engagement, customer support, and overall business efficiency.

articles.title: ‘Fresh and luxurious' shower gel loved by Queen Elizabeth that ‘smells gorgeous' is under $40
articles.summary: Molton Brown is promoting its Orange & Bergamot Bath & Shower Gel, favored by Queen Elizabeth II, available for $35 on their website. A bundle featuring the shower gel and body lotion is offered for $79, and the Orange & Bergamot Fine Liquid Hand Wash is available at Amazon for $32. Salt & Stone Body Wash in Santal & Vetiver is mentioned as an alternative.

articles.title: This Dyson cordless stick vacuum is half off right now
articles.author: Kris Holt
articles.summary: Dyson's Digital Slim cordless vacuum is available for $250, half its original price, on both Amazon and Dyson's website.

articles.title: Boots shoppers 'ditch' toothbrushes for sale gadget that 'saves money on dental appointments'
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Oral-B launched the iO8 electric toothbrush, which uses AI to improve brushing technique and features an OLED display and pressure sensor. The product has received positive feedback on plaque removal and app integration, but some users have reported battery life issues.

articles.title: Glow Up Your Skin at a Discounted Price with Amazons Great Republic Day Sale
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Simple introduced Kind To Skin Refreshing Face Wash, a gentle cleanser, while Minimalist launched a 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash, targeting acne-prone skin. Plum offers a 3% Niacinamide & Rice Water Face Toner for brightening and smoothing skin. DOT & KEY promotes Vitamin C + E Super Bright Gel Face Wash, designed to combat dullness and promote glowing skin.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 could be revealed at any moment so here are my final predictions
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo is speculated to be developing the Nintendo Switch 2, a potential successor to the Nintendo Switch console.

articles.title: Newcastle's Fluffy Fluffy pancake house promises stacks of freebies at weekend opening of the viral hit
articles.author: Barbara Hodgson
articles.summary: Fluffy Fluffy is launching a new pancake house in Newcastle on January 18, offering promotions like free lemonade for the first 100 customers and a 50% discount on all pancakes. The menu features signature soufflé pancakes with various toppings and specialty drinks, along with croffles and seasonal specials.

articles.title: Amazon to end popular shopping perk for Prime members
articles.author: EMMA SALETTA
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service for Prime members on January 31. This service, which allowed customers to try on clothing items at home before purchasing, is being phased out due to limited scaling and the increasing use of AI-powered sizing features. Amazon introduced the service, initially named Prime Wardrobe, in 2017 and officially launched it in 2018.

articles.title: Amazon Prime to drop popular feature as it enhances AI shopping tools
articles.author: Marc Betts
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service on January 31, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing, accessories, and shoes before purchasing. The company is phasing out this service due to its limited reach and is increasingly focusing on new AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations to improve the online shopping experience.

articles.title: Amazon ditches 'Try Before You Buy' on The Morning Show Plus
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' program. The program will no longer be available on Morning Show Plus.

articles.title: Amazon upgrades Kindle Colorsoft already – new model addresses customer complaints
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Kindle Colorsoft, its first color e-reader, along with a refreshed Paperwhite model in late 2024. Some users reported yellow banding on the Colorsoft screen soon after launch, but this issue has reportedly been fixed in newer batches. The Paperwhite features faster page turns and a larger display.

articles.title: Hands-on with the new Asus RTX 50-series graphics cards
articles.author: Michael Crider
articles.summary: Asus showcased five different versions of the new Nvidia RTX 50-series graphics cards at CES 2025. Among them, Asus RTX Dual represents the entry-level card featuring a dual-fan design with no factory overclocking or fancy cooler tech. Asus RTX Prime, offering bigger and more expansive features, stands one step higher.

articles.title: The best baby shampoos for sensitive skin
articles.author: Bethany Heitman
articles.summary: Baby Dove's Sensitive Skin Care shampoo contains moisturizing ingredients like water and glycerin. The Honest Company offers a 2-in-1 Cleansing Shampoo + Body Wash free of sulfates and synthetic fragrances. Aveeno's Baby Daily Moisture Gentle Bath Wash & Shampoo incorporates oat extract for sensitive skin. Babo Botanicals Sensitive Baby Fragrance-Free 2-in-1 Shampoo & Wash contains 23 plant ingredients. CeraVe Baby Wash and Shampoo contains ceramides, hyaluronic acid and vitamin E.

articles.title: Keep baby skin soft and irritation-free with one of these expert-recommended baby shampoos.
articles.author: Bethany Heitman
articles.summary: The article features recommendations for baby shampoos from brands like Baby Dove, The Honest Company, Aveeno, Babo Botanicals, and CeraVe. These shampoos are designed for sensitive skin, focusing on being tear-free, hypoallergenic, and free of sulfates, parabens, and phthalates, while incorporating moisturizing ingredients like glycerin, oat extract, ceramides, and shea butter. The products aim to hydrate and protect babies' sensitive skin during bath time.

articles.title: Walmart's ‘New' Logo Made the Internet Furious
articles.author: Kyle Phillippi
articles.summary: Walmart introduced a new logo after two decades, described as a refresh of its brand identity. The update aims to reflect Walmart's commitment to its customers and the principles of its founder, Sam Walton, with the company stating that 'As our customers evolve, we will too.'

articles.title: Mazda South Africa: Driving Innovation, Commitment, and a Bright Future
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Mazda South Africa is introducing new products, including the CX-80, a premium seven-seater PHEV, the all-new CX-5 Next Generation, and the innovative Mazda 6e and CX-60 PHEV. The company also plans to introduce a Courtesy Vehicle Experience to ensure uninterrupted mobility during vehicle servicing, aiming to elevate the Mazda ownership experience.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 press photos leak ahead of next week's launch event
articles.summary: Leaked press photos reveal the upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25 series, showcasing minor design changes and color options. The Galaxy S25 and S25 Plus will share a similar design with flat screens, while the S25 Ultra features slightly curved corners. The series will include enhanced Galaxy AI features, such as a smarter Bixby and the new Now Bar for AI-generated information.

articles.title: Sketch to image: Samsung teases upcoming AI features for Galaxy S25 Ultra ahead of launch event
articles.author: Livemint
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 Ultra, which will feature new AI capabilities like "Sketch to Image" and an enhanced One UI 7. The new AI feature allows users to generate images from sketches with text or voice prompts. This launch is expected to position the Galaxy S25 Ultra as a leading smartphone for creativity, productivity, and user-centric innovation.

articles.title: OpenAI tests phone number-only ChatGPT signups
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: OpenAI is testing a new feature for ChatGPT that allows new users to sign up using only a phone number, without requiring an email address. This feature is currently in beta in the U.S. and India.

articles.title: Support for start-ups to experiment
articles.summary: Startup Dunedin is offering $10,000 worth of microgrants to help startups run small experiments and test their ideas. This new service is designed to support the development and validation of innovative concepts by providing financial assistance for early-stage experimentation.

articles.title: NVIDIA's AI NPCs are a nightmare
articles.author: Devindra Hardawar
articles.summary: Krafton plans to integrate NVIDIA's ACE to create AI companions in PUBG and improve character intelligence and object generation in InZOI. TiGames' ZooPunk utilizes NVIDIA ACE for dialog generation, virtual voice, and lip-syncing for NPCs. These integrations mark the introduction of advanced AI technology into gaming experiences.

articles.title: Amazon Prime ends 'lifesaver' perk in major blow to customers
articles.author: Kristina Beanland
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' service for Prime members, which allowed customers to try on clothing items, shoes, and accessories at home before purchase. The company cites advancements in AI and improved sizing recommendations as reasons for the change, as they believe these technologies now better serve customer needs in finding the right fit.

articles.title: Roborock released AI-powered vacuums at CES 2025 and we're blown away
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Roborock is launching three new models in its Saros Series: Saros Z70, Saros 10, and Saros 10R. The Saros Z70 features the OmniGrip robotic arm, AI-driven object recognition, and HyperForce suction. The Saros 10R offers similar features without the robotic arm, while the Saros 10 includes Reactive AI 3.0 for advanced obstacle recognition and VibraRise 4.0 for mop detachment.

articles.title: LG launches smarter AI-powered air conditioners for 2025
articles.author: 엑셀 능력자로 만들어 드리겠습니다
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its 2025 air conditioner lineup, including the 'LG Whisen Objet Collection Tower I' and 'LG Whisen Objet Collection View I Pro' models. These air conditioners feature advanced AI technology such as 'LG FURON' for voice recognition and 'AI Airflow' for personalized cooling. LG also offers a subscription service for comprehensive maintenance.

articles.title: Xiaomi Debuts In South Korea With Flagship Launch, Eyes Tech Expansion
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Xiaomi Corp launched its flagship mobile phone products in South Korea. The company showcased two smartphone models, Xiaomi 14T and Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G, at its press conference in Seoul. Xiaomi intends to introduce other products like TVs and wearable devices successively until February.

articles.title: Samsung launches 9 Kg front load washing machines under Bespoke AI laundry series
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new 9KG front load washing machines under the Bespoke AI laundry series. The new machines feature AI Energy Mode, AI Ecobubble, and Super Speed technology. The models are available for purchase via Samsung.com, the Samsung Shop App, retail stores, and other e-commerce platforms, priced from Rs 40,990.

articles.title: WellSaid Announces "Caruso," Highest Quality and Fastest AI Voice Model Yet with New Features Like "AI Director"
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: WellSaid, an AI voice platform, will launch its 'Caruso' model in Q1 2025. Caruso offers high audio quality and new features like AI Director, enabling users to adjust emotional intonation. The new model is also designed to improve first-take capabilities, reducing the need for re-rendering.

articles.title: WellSaid Announces "Caruso," Highest Quality and Fastest AI Voice Model Yet with New Features Like "AI Director"
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: WellSaid is launching 'Caruso', a new AI voice model in Q1 2025, featuring high audio quality and AI Director for adjusting emotional intonation. Caruso aims to improve first-take capabilities and reduce the need for re-rendering, offering users a competitive edge with faster speeds and studio-quality voice narration.

articles.title: WellSaid Announces "Caruso," Highest Quality and Fastest AI Voice Model Yet with New Features Like "AI Director"
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: WellSaid is launching 'Caruso,' a new AI voice model in Q1 2025, accessible through WellSaid Studio. Caruso features AI Director for adjusting emotional intonation, enhanced pronunciation, and boasts 30% faster audio rendering. The new model aims to offer higher audio quality and improved control for users, streamlining audio content creation.

articles.title: Motorola's 2025 Moto G Power: A Durable Budget Phone
articles.author: Tech City
articles.summary: Motorola has unveiled the 2025 Moto G Power, adding a new budget-friendly phone to its Moto G lineup.

articles.title: NVIDIA's AI NPCs are a nightmare
articles.author: Devindra Hardawar
articles.summary: Krafton plans to integrate NVIDIA's ACE (Avatar Cloud Engine) into its games like PUBG and InZOI. This integration aims to power AI companions that interact with players and enhance character intelligence and object generation within the games.

articles.title: Eliza Wakes Up: Eliza AI Agents Take Human Form
articles.author: Eliza Wakes Up
articles.summary: Eliza Wakes Up announced pre-orders for "Eliza," a next-generation personal robot. This state-of-the-art personal companion, powered by Eliza Wakes Up's ElizaOS and incubated by Ryze Labs, integrates AI, blockchain technology, and advanced robotics into a fully customized humanoid robot.

articles.title: Haut.AI Announces Commercial Availability of SkinGPT Technology and Launches Interactive 'Generative.Skin' Experience for Consumers
articles.author: Haut.AI
articles.summary: Haut.AI commercially launched SkinGPT on January 15, 2025. SkinGPT is a generative AI technology designed for beauty brands and enables virtual skincare try-ons by simulating the effects of products and treatments.

articles.title: Start.io Partners with Intent IQ to Enhance Ad Bids with Alternative ID Solution and Audience ...
articles.author: Intent IQ
articles.summary: Start.io partnered with Intent IQ to enhance its audience targeting capabilities. This partnership utilized Intent IQ's identity resolution platform to match mobile advertising IDs, resulting in a 9.8% increase in fill rate and a 12% increase in daily revenue for Start.io.

articles.title: Start.io Partners with Intent IQ to Enhance Ad Bids with Alternative ID Solution and Audience ...
articles.author: Intent IQ
articles.summary: Start.io partnered with Intent IQ to expand its audience targeting capabilities using Intent IQ's identity resolution platform. Start.io achieved a 9.8 percent higher fill rate and 12 percent higher daily revenue from ads enhanced by Intent IQ's data in testing. Start.io will roll out enhanced mobile ad requests to all demand partners.

articles.title: Roborock launches Roborock Qrevo Curv, the next generation of smart home cleaning with AI technology and pet-friendly features
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Roborock has launched the Roborock Qrevo Curv, a new robot vacuum and mop featuring advanced navigation, powerful suction (18,500 Pa), and a multifunctional dock with hot water mop washing. It is available at Emag at a special price of 6,299 lei and is part of a special promotion starting from the 14th of January: at the price of 7299 Lei, you can get the Qrevo Curv bundled with the Flexi Lite vacuum, limited to the stock available.

articles.title: Walmart gets new logo. See reactions and tell us what you think
articles.author: Cheryl McCloud
articles.summary: Walmart has initiated a brand refresh, updating its logo to better represent the company's current identity. The new branding became visible on Walmart.com and the app in January 2025 and is being implemented in stores throughout the year, having initially launched in Springdale, Arkansas in October 2024.

articles.title: We found the secret skincare device behind Kim K's glowing red-carpet skin and it costs less than you think
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: PMD Beauty has launched the Clean Redvolution tool, which combines red light therapy with SonicGlow Technology for deep pore cleansing and skin rejuvenation. Additionally, the PMD SilkSteam Pro and PMD Kiss System are highlighted as popular skincare devices, with the SilkSteam Pro offering facial steaming for hydration and the Kiss System providing lip plumping effects.

articles.title: We found the secret skincare device behind Kim Kardashian's glowing red-carpet skin and it costs less than you think
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: PMD Beauty has launched the Clean Redvolution, a tool combining red light therapy with SonicGlow Technology™ to cleanse pores and rejuvenate skin. The brand is also promoting the PMD SilkSteam Pro, a facial steaming device. Both products are endorsed by celebrities and aim to provide spa-quality skincare at home.

articles.title: Amazon Is Saying Goodbye To This Popular Service In New York
articles.author: Welber
articles.summary: Amazon is ending its Prime Wardrobe program, known as 'Try Before You Buy', effective January 31, 2025. This decision is influenced by the introduction of new AI-powered features such as virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations, which Amazon believes will better serve customers in finding the right fit.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: The next big leap in mobile AI experiences
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil the next evolution of Galaxy AI and the new Galaxy S series at the Unpacked event on January 22 in San Jose. The new products promise to deliver more natural and intuitive AI mobile experiences.

articles.title: Samsung Teases AI Features in Galaxy S25 Ahead of Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Sowmya Sangam
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 series with advanced AI capabilities, including an upgraded Sketch to Image feature powered by Android 15-based One UI 7.0. The Galaxy S25 Slim, a new addition, will feature a 6.66-inch display and a triple-camera system, while the Galaxy S25 Ultra will offer a 6.88-inch QHD+ Super AMOLED display and up to 1TB storage. These AI features will also expand to earlier models like the Galaxy S24 lineup, Galaxy Z Fold6, and Galaxy Z Flip6.

articles.title: The Best UK MVNO Networks For Cheap Data In 2025
articles.summary: Vodafone offers reliable coverage for budget users; Sky provides data rollover for existing customers; Tesco targets shoppers and families with rewards; and O2 provides flexible plans with great coverage. These mobile service plans emphasize affordability and flexibility.

articles.title: EPAM Expands Collaboration with Google Cloud to Deliver Scalable AI Solutions for Industry Transformation
articles.author: EPAM Systems
articles.summary: New AI-powered solutions are introduced to tackle generative AI, legacy modernization, and data analytics. These solutions aim to solve industry-specific challenges. These solutions represent a new service or product offering.

articles.title: Start the New Year with Steak Stroganoff: Noodles & Company's Fan-Favorite is Back--Get It While It's StroganON!
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Noodles & Company has reintroduced Steak Stroganoff, a popular dish, for a limited time at all its locations nationwide, beginning January 15, 2025. Guests can order it in restaurants, via the Noodles mobile app, or through third-party delivery. This re-launch follows the dish's successful return in 2024 when it sold out quickly.

articles.title: According to Jennifer Garner, ‘You Do See a Difference' After Using This $29 Rapid Wrinkle Repair Cream
articles.author: Savannah Born
articles.summary: Neutrogena is promoting its Rapid Repair Retinol Moisturizer, a fragrance-free product that aims to tighten skin, plump it, and even skin tone. The moisturizer contains ingredients that yield younger-looking skin in one week and can be applied twice daily on the face and neck.

articles.title: Deals of the week: Dyson discounts, Brown Thomas designer sale plus free Charlotte Tilbury skincare
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Aldi is offering a homeware sale featuring items like candles and rugs. Charlotte Tilbury provides free skincare with purchases over €110.  A new maxi size of Cloud Cream is available at a reduced price. Brown Thomas offers discounts on designer bags from brands like Jacquemus.

articles.title: 'I work at Tesco – there's 'impeccable' new meal deal snack no one's talking about'
articles.author: Alice Sjoberg
articles.summary: Tesco has introduced soup as a snack option in its popular meal deal. Shoppers can now choose from New Covent Garden's Classic Chicken Soup or Creamy Tomato Soup as part of their meal deal.

articles.title: Realbotix CES 2025 Update
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Realbotix successfully exhibited its products at CES 2025, unveiling its new modular robot, Melody. The company showcased its humanoid robots and AI, generating customer interest and potential partnerships. This event marked Realbotix's first trade show, highlighting growing demand for its AI-enabled robots.

articles.title: Amazon knocks 57% off earbuds that are 'crystal clear' and 'superior' to expensive brands
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: TOZO is offering the NC9 Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Wireless Earbuds, praised for sound quality and noise cancellation, for £29.99 (originally £69.99). Ninja has launched its Perfect Temperature Rapid Boil Kettle with adjustable temperature control and a rapid boil feature, currently on sale for £59.99 (originally £99.99).

articles.title: This new high-street perfume smells just like Glossier you – but it's half the price
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: & Other Stories launched Blank Pages, a new fragrance, earlier this month. This new fragrance, with its minimalist packaging and clean, fresh scent, is presented as a more affordable alternative to Glossier You, sharing similar notes such as pepper and iris (or iris seed).

articles.title: Skincare brand Foxtale raises $30 million led by Japanese beauty firm Kose Corporation
articles.author: Pranav Mukul
articles.summary: Foxtale, a skincare brand, previously launched a body care category, which has achieved a run rate of Rs 40 crore. The company intends to expand into additional categories over the next two years. The company has witnessed six-to-sevenfold growth on quick commerce channel since launch on the platforms over the last six months.

articles.title: Win 1 of 5 £100 Lounge gift cards this Valentine's Day
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Lounge is offering the chance to win a £100 e-gift card to spend on its Valentine's collection, which emphasizes self-worth and elegance. The e-gift cards are delivered by email and can be used to purchase items from the collection. By subscribing to Lounge, customers consent to receive marketing messages.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra pre-orders may start on January 22: Here's what we know
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Ultra with a pre-reserve program for Rs.2000. The official launch is set for January 22, 2025, with pre-orders expected to start soon after and deliveries by February 3, while official sales may begin on February 9, 2025. The Galaxy S25 Ultra will offer new color options and features Galaxy AI, including improved Sketch to Image and natural language for Galaxy Notes.

articles.title: OpenAI releases ‘Tasks,' ChatGPT's latest feature that can set reminders
articles.summary: OpenAI has released a new 'Tasks' feature for ChatGPT, allowing users to set reminders and recurring actions. This feature is currently available in beta to Plus, Pro, and Teams users, with plans to eventually roll it out to all ChatGPT accounts. ChatGPT Tasks can be used to schedule reminders for various activities, such as workouts or personalized meal plans.

articles.title: This is how you can claim a free luxury gift from Marks and Spencer during your birthday month
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer offers a free birthday gift to customers who are members of their Sparks rewards scheme. Members can select from a variety of sweet treats, including mini bites and Swiss chocolate truffles, with dairy-free and vegan options available. The free gift can be claimed anytime during the customer's birthday month through the Sparks app.

articles.title: How Leaders Innovate To Fill In Market Gaps From AI To Heavy Materials
articles.author: Alexander Puutio
articles.summary: Fujitsu has launched its Kozuchi AI platform, developed over several years, now partnering with MoBagel for deployment and integration. Bulk Exchange introduces a digital intermediary platform designed to connect players in the construction industry, providing a specialized search engine for suppliers and contractors.

articles.title: This Trimmer Is A Game-Changer For Taking Care Of Sensitive Areas
articles.author: Haley Zovickian
articles.summary: Meridian offers an electric razor that efficiently cuts through thick hair, preventing razor burn and ingrown hairs. The Meridian hair trimmer/electric razor can be used on dry or wet skin and includes a nick guard. It is available in three colors, includes various guards, and comes with a one-year warranty.

articles.title: 2nd-Curv Unveils 5 SEC High-Speed Dishwasher at CES 2025
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: 2nd-Curv has launched its 5 SEC High-Speed Dishwasher at CES 2025. This new product uses a detergent-free, rapid cleaning technology, consuming only 600mL of water and 0.06 kWh of electricity per wash. The dishwasher aims to provide a faster and eco-friendly cleaning experience.

articles.title: Samsung Enhances AI Sketch to Image Feature for Galaxy S25 with New Drawing Assist Integration
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing new features for its Galaxy S25 series, focusing on an upgrade to the AI-powered "Sketch to Image" tool. This enhanced feature, integrated with Drawing Assist, allows users to input descriptions via text or voice commands, enabling the creation of detailed images from sketches.

articles.title: Moto G 5G, Moto G Power 2025: Specifications, Prices, Availability, and More
articles.summary: Motorola has introduced the Moto G 5G 2025, starting at $199.99, and the Moto G Power 2025, priced at $299.99, both designed for the US market. The Moto G 5G 2025 will be available on January 30, 2025, while the Moto G Power 2025 will be available from February 6, 2025, via Motorola's official website and Amazon.

articles.title: 2nd-Curv Unveils 5 SEC High-Speed Dishwasher at CES 2025
articles.author: 2ND-CURV.CO.
articles.summary: 2nd-Curv launched its 5 SEC High-Speed Dishwasher at CES 2025. This revolutionary dishwasher is designed to be detergent-free, providing a rapid cleaning solution that minimizes energy consumption and avoids the use of chemicals.

articles.title: TNW Conference 2025 is reborn — with a new startup mission
articles.author: Thomas Macaulay
articles.summary: TNW Conference is relaunching with a focus on elevating startups and scaleups, introducing new features such as the Corporate Innovator ticket and the Tech5 competition. The conference aims to provide a platform for startups to gain exposure, connect with investors, and find new clients, while also offering corporate innovators a chance to learn and innovate at scale.

articles.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 Review: A 'Nano' Upgrade, Or Is It?
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the Pad 7 tablet, priced at Rs 27,999. The tablet features an 11.2-inch IPS LCD display with a 144Hz refresh rate and an optional Nano-texture coating. It is powered by the Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 chipset and offers accessories like the Focus Keyboard and Focus Pen. The device houses an 8,850mAh battery with 45W fast charging.

articles.title: Some new robot vacuums can deter home invasions by taking pictures of burglars
articles.author: Morning Brew
articles.summary: Roborock and Dreame introduced robot vacuums with pincers capable of picking up objects weighing up to 300 and 500 grams, respectively. Dreame's robovac features climbing 'legs' for navigating small elevation changes. Samsung's Jet Bot Combo AI robot vacuum includes intruder detection capabilities, enabling it to send images of potential burglars to the homeowner via the Samsung smart appliance ecosystem.

articles.title: National Bagel Day: Here's the spread on where to get yours in Greater New Bedford
articles.author: Faith Harrington
articles.summary: Scramblers Breakfast & Bagel offers 19 bagel flavors daily with various spreads. Scuttlebutt Padanaram sells homemade sea salt bagels as breakfast sandwiches. The Donut Factory introduces stuffed bagels with flavors like fluffernutter and cotton candy.

articles.title: Beauty and The Bot: How new tech and AI analysis are changing the skincare game
articles.author: Nathalie Marquez Courtney
articles.summary: L'Oréal showcased beauty tech innovations like Giorgio Armani's skin profiler and temporary tattoo printers. Haumea offers at-home skincare devices, including a smart sonic facial brush and LED tri-booster. Geske is launching a range of affordable beauty tools in the Irish market.

articles.title: Here's how you can make good use of OpenAI ChatGPT's AI assistant feature 'Tasks'
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching a beta version of 'tasks' for ChatGPT. This new feature allows users to instruct ChatGPT to perform actions at a future time, including one-time reminders and recurring actions.

articles.title: 'I'm a beauty writer and there's a way to get £150 worth of treats for £13 with LookFantastic'
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: LookFantastic has launched the January edition of its monthly subscription box, offering a selection of premium beauty products valued at over £105. Additionally, LookFantastic introduced The Glow 'n' Go Edit, a beauty box designed for achieving radiant skin, priced at £35 but valued at over £130, containing eight hydration products.

articles.title: Shining at CES 2025, TCL Garners Multiple Awards for Display Innovations and Smart Home Solutions
articles.author: PR Newswire Asia
articles.summary: TCL Electronics received multiple awards at CES 2025 for its innovative products. The TCL 50 PRO NXTPAPER 5G smartphone won a CES 2025 Innovation Award, and the TCL Premium QD-Mini LED TV X11K, FreshIN Series Air Conditioner, and TCL Super Drum Series Front Load Washing Machine also received innovation awards. Additionally, TCL's 5G RedCap dongle, the TCL LINKPORT IK511, along with TCL 50 PRO NXTPAPER 5G were honored with the 2025 CES Picks Award.

articles.title: ChatGPT rolls out surprising new feature to make users' life easier
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new feature called 'Tasks' for ChatGPT, which allows users to schedule repeated actions or reminders. This feature, currently in beta, is available to Team, Pro, and Plus users on web, desktop, and mobile. Examples of tasks include weekly news briefings, daily weather updates, and medication reminders.

articles.title: Shining at CES 2025, TCL Garners Multiple Awards for Display Innovations and Smart Home Solutions
articles.author: TCL
articles.summary: TCL Electronics was honored with multiple awards at CES 2025. The TCL 50 PRO NXTPAPER 5G smartphone received the CES 2025 Innovation Award. The TCL Premium QD-Mini LED TV X11K received the "Mini LED Display Technology Innovation Award".

articles.title: iWALK Launches the World's First Portable Charger with Switch Plugs – The Ultimate Solution for Both Apple and Android Users
articles.summary: iWALK has launched the LinkPod Switch, a portable power bank featuring an innovative dual-plug design compatible with both Apple Lightning and Android USB-C devices. This pocket-sized charger eliminates the need for multiple cables and offers a 5,000mAh battery for convenient on-the-go charging. The LinkPod Switch is now available for purchase.

articles.title: Amazon to axe popular Prime membership perk this month in blow to shoppers
articles.author: Emilia Kettle
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' scheme for Prime members on January 31. This scheme allowed customers to try clothing, shoes, and accessories before purchasing. Amazon cites limited reach and the increasing use of AI-powered features like virtual try-on as reasons for discontinuing the service. However, free returns on apparel items will remain available.

articles.title: OpenAI Introduces 'Tasks', A Virtual Assistant-Like Feature To Rival Siri and Alexa
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: OpenAI introduced 'Tasks' for ChatGPT, a feature that allows users to schedule future actions and reminders. It is currently available in beta for ChatGPT Plus, Team, and Pro subscribers. Apple has also integrated its 'Apple Intelligence' technology into Siri, leveraging ChatGPT's capabilities.

articles.title: Geniuslead Solution: Best Telemarketing Services in USA
articles.summary: Geniuslead Solution offers personalized outbound telemarketing campaigns as a strategic business growth partner. They use technology and industry expertise to generate leads, nurture relationships, and convert opportunities. The company provides customized solutions from lead generation to customer retention.

articles.title: Samsung teases Galaxy S25 Ultra's multimodal image-generational capability ahead of launch
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch the Galaxy S25 Ultra featuring an improved "Sketch to Image" powered by multimodal generative AI. Users can create rough sketches and provide context via voice commands and text input to generate images. Initially exclusive to the Galaxy S25 series, these AI experiences will later be available on other devices like Galaxy S24 Ultra and S23 series.

articles.title: Ampere Magnus Neo launched in India challenging Ola S1 X. Here's how these two electric scooters compete with each other
articles.author: Ht Auto Desk
articles.summary: Ampere has launched the Magnus Neo electric scooter in India, with a starting price of ₹ 79,999. The scooter features a 2.3 kWh LFP battery pack, offering a range of over 100 km and a top speed of 65 kmph. The Ola S1 X is a key competitor, available with different battery pack options and a starting price of ₹ 69,999.

articles.title: Ampere Magnus Neo vs Ola S1 X: Price and specification comparison
articles.author: Ht Auto Desk
articles.summary: Ampere has launched the Magnus Neo electric scooter in India at a starting price of ₹79,999. The scooter features a 2.3 kWh LFP battery pack offering a range of over 100 km and a top speed of 65 kmph. It competes with the Ola S1 X in the Indian electric scooter market.

articles.title: TCL unveils the World's Largest 115' QD Mini LED TV 115X955 Max
articles.summary: TCL has launched the 115X955 Max, a QD Mini LED 4K TV with a 115-inch display, featuring over 20,000 local dimming zones, AiPQ Pro processor, and Game Master technology. Available from January 14, 2025, the TV is priced at Rs 29,99,990/-, with a pre-booking offer including a complimentary 75" QLED TV.

articles.title: Adobe Brings New AI Tool That Can Edit 10,000 Images In One Second: Know How
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Adobe is launching 'Firefly Bulk Create,' a new tool within its Firefly web app (currently in beta) that allows users to modify backgrounds or resize up to 10,000 photos with a single click. Adobe also intends to release 'Dubbing and Lip Sync' for video editing and 'digital avatars' that are created using voice recordings and written descriptions.

articles.title: Ampere Magnus Neo Electric Scooter Launched In India Priced At Rs 79,999
articles.author: Amulya Raj Srinet
articles.summary: Ampere has launched the Magnus Neo, a new electric scooter variant, in India for Rs 79,999. The Neo features a 2.3 kWh battery pack providing a 100 km range, a digital instrument cluster with connectivity features, and enhanced safety measures, with deliveries starting in late January 2025.

articles.title: Motorola's new budget phone is surprisingly rugged
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Moto G Power features an IP69 rating for water and dust resistance. This rating surpasses that of many flagship phones, indicating a high level of durability.

articles.title: DJI Flip is a $439, fully foldable camera drone
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: DJI launched the Flip, a pint-sized consumer drone featuring a foldable design with propeller guards for enhanced portability. This new product continues DJI's focus on compact form factors within its consumer drone portfolio.

articles.title: YTL gets green light for Ryt Bank, Malaysia's first ‘AI-powered' digital bank in venture with Shopee owner
articles.author: Alexander Wong
articles.summary: YTL Digital Bank Berhad, in partnership with Sea Limited, has launched Ryt Bank, Malaysia's first AI-powered digital bank. Ryt Bank will roll out in phases and features Ryt AI, a ChatGPT-style private banker designed to simplify banking services and provide tailored financial insights.

articles.title: 33 Products That Will Do The Household Jobs You've Been Neglecting Since You Moved In
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article highlights a diverse range of recently introduced or updated household cleaning and organization products available on Amazon and Etsy. These include items like WD-40 pens for precise lubrication, clothes folding boards, hypoallergenic makeup brush shampoo, rust remover spray, and innovative solutions such as the Tulip shade for unattractive ceiling lights. Many of the products come from small businesses, like Everneat and Quick & Clean, specializing in cleaning solutions.

articles.title: ChatGPT just dipped its toes into the world of AI agents
articles.author: Andrew Tarantola
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching a new feature called ChatGPT Tasks for its paid subscribers. This feature enables users to set individual and recurring reminders through the ChatGPT interface. It allows ChatGPT to perform specific actions in the future, such as assembling news briefs or providing weather updates.

articles.title: Watch DJI show off its new Flip drone in 260 seconds
articles.author: Trevor Mogg
articles.summary: DJI has launched the Flip, a new drone aimed at vloggers and content creators. The Flip features a 1/1.3-inch CMOS sensor for 48MP photos and 4K HDR video at 60fps. It includes foldable propeller guards and supports 4K slow-motion recording, along with Dual Native ISO Fusion for low-light performance.

articles.title: AI-Driven Allergen Alerts Now Available in Genesis Foods
articles.author: Trustwell
articles.summary: Genesis Foods has launched a new AI-powered feature within its software. This addition analyzes custom ingredient data and alerts users to potential allergens, even under alternative names. The update aims to improve ingredient labeling and recipe accuracy.

articles.title: New Look's 'country girl' outfit for city life that shoppers say they 'love'
articles.author: Ellis Whitehouse
articles.summary: New Look has launched a new outfit set, described as 'country girl in the city,' featuring a black cardigan, checkered skirt, leopard skin scarf, golden earrings, high black boots, and a dark brown handbag. The retailer unveiled the look on their Instagram page, generating enthusiastic responses from fans.

articles.title: Latest Galaxy S25 leaks reveal new design detail we haven't seen before
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra. Leaked images reveal sleek designs and new features like the 'Now Bar' in One UI 7. Customers can reserve the new Galaxy device ahead of the January 22 launch to receive $50 Samsung Credit and other savings.

articles.title: Samsung to Unveil New Galaxy AI Features at Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing the 'Now Bar,' an AI-driven feature for the Galaxy S series, at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event.  This feature personalizes user experience by streamlining tasks and offering tailored recommendations.  The company aims to create more intuitive and user-centric smartphone experiences.

articles.title: OpenAI rolls out assistant-like feature 'Tasks' to take on Alexa, Siri
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: ChatGPT is introducing a new "Tasks" feature. This feature allows users to schedule reminders and recurring actions.

articles.title: KSA's Revie Secures US$2.5 Million in Seed Funding Round
articles.author: Inc. Arabia Team
articles.summary: Sanabil and Orbit have launched an accelerator program designed for early-stage startups. This program represents a new service offering from both companies.

articles.title: DJI's Flip combines the best of its lightweight drones for $439
articles.author: Steve Dent
articles.summary: DJI has launched the Flip, a new lightweight drone designed for both beginners and experienced users. The Flip features a large sensor, 4K 100p video capabilities, safety features including a LiDAR system for obstacle detection, and a three-axis gimbal. Its design allows for permit-free flying in most countries due to its weight being under 249 grams.

articles.title: The Morning After: What to expect from Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked event next week
articles.author: Mat Smith
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy S25 series, including standard, Plus, and Ultra models. The new phones are expected to feature subtle design changes like rounded corners and thinner bezels, and will likely be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chip in the US, promising improved performance and battery life. Rumors also suggest potential AI features, including a personalized clothing suggestion agent.

articles.title: ChatGPT's new feature lets you make to-do lists and set reminders
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching a new 'Tasks' feature for ChatGPT, currently available in beta to ChatGPT Plus, Team, and Pro subscribers. This feature allows ChatGPT to perform tasks asynchronously at a future time, including one-time reminders and recurring actions, with users able to manage and modify these tasks through the platform.

articles.title: Earth Ninja Launches New Scented Shoe Ninjas: A Fresh Way to Kick Out Stink
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Earth Ninja launched Scented Shoe Ninjas, eco-friendly reusable deodorizers, on January 15, 2025. These deodorizers, available in Citrus and Ocean scents, utilize activated charcoal to eliminate odors in shoes, bags, and gear for up to a year.

articles.title: Ettan owners to debut new Cal-Indian restaurant in Menlo Park
articles.author: Mountain View Voice
articles.summary: The creators of Ettan in Palo Alto are launching their most polished product to date. This signifies a new offering entering the market from the company.

articles.title: Huge Samsung rival unveils new Android phone with mega camera and ‘unrivalled' battery – plus ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Honor launched the Magic7 Pro, a new Android smartphone, in Europe. The phone features a mega camera and a battery that fully charges quickly and incorporates AI features to enhance photography. It is available in three colors.

articles.title: This new high-street perfume smells just like Glossier you – but it's half the price
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: A company launched a new fragrance, priced £30 less than Glossier's competing product.

articles.title: Empowering women's footwear brands: custom high heels made easy
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A specialized women's shoe manufacturer assists startups, designers, and established businesses in creating their own shoe brands or expanding their footwear collections. The company supports clients from shoe design through manufacturing.

articles.title: Cloud Compute (VPS). Instant Delivery Worldwide (6 Locations)
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: The company has launched next-generation Virtual Machines with instant provisioning. These cloud VMs feature the latest generation Intel CPUs and high-speed NVMe/SSD storage options.

articles.title: Petron Malaysia Opens Milestone 800th Service Station (Petron Malaysia Refining&Marketing Bhd)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: PETRON MALAYSIA opened its 800th service station, Petron Pedas-Linggi Layby Southbound, demonstrating a commitment to customer-centric solutions. This launch furthers the company's expansion and service availability in Malaysia.

articles.title: The best rose sex toys for 2025, tried and tested
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: A new category of sex toys known as "rose" has gained significant attention on TikTok. Testers are evaluating various rose sex toys to determine the best options.

articles.title: Xiaomi begins operations in S. Korea with official product launch
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Xiaomi Corp. officially launched its smartphone.
